location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

environment.Description: Fully qualified resource ID for the environment that the portable resource is linked to

application.Description: Fully qualified resource ID for the application that the portable resource is consumed by (if applicable)

provisioningState.Description: Provisioning state of the resource at the time the operation was called

componentName.Description: The name of the Dapr component object. Use this value in your code when interacting with the Dapr client to use the Dapr component.

type.Description: Dapr component type which must matches the format used by Dapr Kubernetes configuration format

resources.Description: A collection of references to resources associated with the pubSubBroker

recipe.Description: The recipe used to automatically deploy underlying infrastructure for a portable resource

resourceProvisioning.Description: Specifies how the underlying service/resource is provisioned and managed. Available values are 'recipe', where Radius manages the lifecycle of the resource through a Recipe, and 'manual', where a user manages the resource and provides the values.

recipe.Description: Recipe status at deployment time for a resource.

resourceId.Description: The resource id of the compute resource for application environment.

identity.Description: IdentitySettings is the external identity setting.

kind.Description: IdentitySettingKind is the kind of supported external identity setting

oidcIssuer.Description: The URI for your compute platform's OIDC issuer

resource.Description: The resource ID of the provisioned identity

namespace.Description: The namespace to use for the environment.

templateKind.Description: TemplateKind is the kind of the recipe template used by the portable resource upon deployment.

templatePath.Description: TemplatePath is the path of the recipe consumed by the portable resource upon deployment.

templateVersion.Description: TemplateVersion is the version number of the template.

localId.Description: The logical identifier scoped to the owning Radius resource. This is only needed or used when a resource has a dependency relationship. LocalIDs do not have any particular format or meaning beyond being compared to determine dependency relationships.

id.Description: The UCP resource ID of the underlying resource.

radiusManaged.Description: Determines whether Radius manages the lifecycle of the underlying resource.

id.Description: Resource id of an existing resource

name.Description: The name of the recipe within the environment to use

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

environment.Description: Fully qualified resource ID for the environment that the portable resource is linked to

application.Description: Fully qualified resource ID for the application that the portable resource is consumed by (if applicable)

provisioningState.Description: Provisioning state of the resource at the time the operation was called

componentName.Description: The name of the Dapr component object. Use this value in your code when interacting with the Dapr client to use the Dapr component.

type.Description: Dapr component type which must matches the format used by Dapr Kubernetes configuration format

recipe.Description: The recipe used to automatically deploy underlying infrastructure for a portable resource

resourceProvisioning.Description: Specifies how the underlying service/resource is provisioned and managed. Available values are 'recipe', where Radius manages the lifecycle of the resource through a Recipe, and 'manual', where a user manages the resource and provides the values.
